title: Package to model Sydney beach water temps
text: goal repository act template demonstrating full end end MLOps style R project. toy example training predictive model csv dataset. project addresses might want structure project run ‘Production’ context. go details workshop Data Science Workflows R introduction deploying production quality R code. includes: Data import cleaning tidyverse Data documentation Documented R functions processing model training using roxygen2 R package structure Model training inference pipeline using quarto Unit tests testthat Monitoring dashboard interactive rmarkdown flexdashboard Model card documenting model ethics, decision recommended use cases Prediction API endpoint creation using plumber Model versioning metadata storage using vetiver pins Fully containerized deployment using Docker Dependency managment using renv Project website documentation using pkgdown Continuous Integration (CI) pipeline automated using Github Actions

title: Package to model Sydney beach water temps
text: basic example using deployed outputs project. Clone repository: git clone https://github.com/deanmarchiori/r-model-template.git build docker image: docker build -t beach . run : docker run -p 8080:8080 beach endpoint now live http://127.0.0.1:8080 Video
